Game.Name: R-Type Part-2 (Japan)
Game.plot: This contains the last, and more challenging, four levels from R-Type. Released in the US as part 1 & 2 on one card.HINTS:- All items and 99 lives -At the title screen select Password and enter the following: JJL-6589-MBhttp://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/R-Type_II.htm
